casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Eddie Lee DIXON, Defendant-Appellant. No. 30818

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 13, 1971. James W. Smith, Smith, Gardner, Wiggins, Geer & Brimberry, Albany, Ga., for defendant-appellant. William J. Schloth, U. S. Atty., Charles T. Erion, Asst. U. S. Atty., Macon, Ga., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before JOHN R. BROWN, Chief Judge, INGRAHAM and RONEY, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir., see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
